General.Name: Chien Wei Precise Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Chien Wei Precise Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells 2D/3D precise measuring instruments. It also provides JIG grinders, machining centers, vertical grinding machines, IC-semiconductor special accessories, trimming and forming products, ultra-precision optics, and DVD molds. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 20-16, Chen Pei N. Lane, Kaohsiung, Taiwan, 83041
